Text saved: Another suggested defence against an asteroid, which is a large rock that travels through space, is to blow it up with a nuclear weapon if it is on a course to hit Earth. This idea may sound like the plot from a film, and it was the subject of the 1998 movie *Armageddon*, but NASA has a real plan for this called HAMMER. According to this plan, eight-ton rockets would be fired at an approaching asteroid with the hope of pushing it off course. However, if the asteroid was too close to Earth for this plan to work, the rockets would carry nuclear bombs to blow it up instead.
